data.title: Aggressive Arcade Rendezvous to Spawn
data.description: Seek an early engagement towards Arcade with this easy, but powerful Rendezvous lineup towards the B Site.

data.title: B Main Rendezvous + Dish Trademark
data.description: Place this setup at the start of the round to seek an early engagement towards B Main while making sure Attackers towards Dish cannot rush up quickly.

data.title: Arcade Trademark Peek Play
data.description: Have you or a teammate peek off your Trademark placed towards Arcade, for an easy pick. Becareful as Attackers have an angle to shoot when rotating between the B Site and spawn.

data.title: Arcade Trip + B Main Top TP
data.description: Use this combination of utility to keep Attackers guessing when taking B control. You can place your TP on the floor instead, to get to cover quicker if needed.
